short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a cozy Christmas room with a live wallpaper that brings the warmth and joy of the holidays to your new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience into a cozy holiday retreat with the Christmas Room Live Wallpaper Chrome extension. Your new tab will showcase a beautifully decorated room filled with twinkling lights, a glowing fireplace, and a festive Christmas tree. Embrace the warmth and joy of the holiday season every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🎄 Festive Christmas room with detailed decorations and a glowing ambiance.
🔥 Animated fireplace for a cozy and warm holiday feeling.
🔍 Customizable search bar to match your preferences.
🕒 Clock and date display, seamlessly integrated into the design.
🌐 Quick-access shortcuts to your favorite websites.
Add a touch of holiday cheer to your Chrome browser and enjoy the festive vibes all season long!

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
